meanings.sent1: The tree budded beautiful flowers in the spring.
meanings.sent2: The rose bush budded new leaves after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The gardeners were surprised when the cactus budded tiny pink flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity budded like a flower in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The hope in her heart budded slowly but surely, bringing warmth to her soul.

meanings.definition: To begin to grow or develop.
meanings.sent1: The friendship between the two children budded during recess.
meanings.sent2: The small business budded into a successful company over time.
meanings.sent3: The idea for the new invention budded in his mind while he was daydreaming.
meanings.sent4: Her interest in painting budded into a passion that consumed her.
meanings.sent5: The seed of curiosity budded in his mind, leading him on a journey of discovery.
